data.name: flask webserver or something #2 [POST]
data.description:
flask webserver or something #2

task

Make a flask server with `localhost` as the host and `4000` as the port.
Make two routes which should have the following properties: 1. The home route `'/'` that responds on [GET] requests and returns the dictionary `{"toreturn": "whatitreturned"}`; 2. The resert route `'/reset'` that responds on [POST] requests and returns the JSON value for attribute `'code'`. Also make a `runner()` method where the flask server will be hosted i.e. where the `run()` method will be for the webserver.

NOTE

1. Sometimes the requests library wont connect because of certain unknown reason, in those cases just reattempt in 2-3 seconds. 2. Declare the webserver outside of runner method if you face the error frequently.

kata in series

1. [flask webserver or something #1](https://www.codewars.com/kata/62270ecbf6c169004879eca1)
